issue.title: [Rust] unset_bit is toggling bits, not unsetting them
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11311](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11311). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The functions `bit_util::unset_bit[_raw]` are currently toggling bits, not setting them.
